name: Musketeer: After Winter [DEMO / Chapter 1]
description:
Twenty years after the musketeers defeated Cardinal Richelieu and Milady de Winter, the resolve and loyalty of our four swashbuckling comrades to each other is no longer what it once was.

Athos lives a quiet life in hiding. Porthos has become a rich gold digger. Aramis has returned to being a man of the cloth. And D'Artagnan, finally an esteemed member of the King's Musketeers, has become disillusioned by the everyday drudgery.

Civil war threatens both France and England. In England, Cromwell schemes to take power from King Charles I and the Musketeers soon find themselves embroiled in political intrigue.

But the infamous quartet's greatest foe may just come in the form of a ghost from their shared pasts.

Full Game: WIP. Will eventually be 18+.
